summary: This bill, S. 2599, introduced in the Senate on July 31, 2025, aims to modify the State Partnership Program (SPP) selection analysis. It directs the Secretary of Defense to update Department of Defense Instruction 5111.20 to ensure the Chief of the National Guard Bureau considers the number of existing SPP partnerships assigned to a state's National Guard during selection analysis. Furthermore, the bill prioritizes states with only one active country assignment under this program.
